```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
rm(list = ls())
if (!require(devtools)){
    install.packages('devtools')
}
devtools::install_github('progenetix/pgxRpi')
library(pgxRpi)
```


#Melanoma C3224
```{r}
freq <- pgxLoader(type='frequency', output='pgxseg',filters='NCIT:C3224',
                  codematches=T)
```

```{r}
pgxFreqplot(freq)
```

```{r}
pgxFreqplot(freq, chrom = 24)
```

# I find gains at: 2q, 6q, 7, 8q, 17q, 20, 22q
# losses at: 4, 6q, 9, 10, 11, Y(?)
# These finds are consistant with the majority of this [paper](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/pcmr.12436)
